archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Develop Algorithmic Product Offering Pricing Matrix Specification Structure
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Develop the structure of a product offering pricing matrix by defining its rows and columns and other dimensions.

properties.value: Develop Algorithmic Product Offering Pricing Matrix Specification Structure defines (creates, modifies, and removes) the structure of a product offering pricing matrix including its row(s)/columns and other dimensions of a multi-dimensional matrix as well as their sequence. The rows and columns represent the criteria evaluated to determine the charge/allowance. They represent such things as types of product features/properties, types of product offering prices, algorithmic specific criteria such as type of customer, and so forth.
